q: during a Thursday conference call with analysts, with Eric Schmidt describing Google Inc. 's co-founders as his "best friends." "I believe Larry is ready" to be CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call. It's time for him to have a shot at running this. Page hailed Eric Schmidt as a "tremendous leader" whose contributions exceeded all expectations. "There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done," Page said.

the Indy Star: U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters. Stadium, Big Ben Roethlisberger would become the only active quarterback other than Tom Brady to win three Super Bowls. "Just thanking the Lord," Ben Roethlisberger said following the Steelers' 24-19 win over the Jets. We've been through a lot as a team and personally. Other than Michael Vick , no player in the NFL went through a more scrutinized season than Ben Roethlisberger . What's the pressure of playing in another Super Bowl after what Ben Roethlisberger 's been through?

. Critics might question why Joe Biden didn't immediately prepare to deploy as many as 150,000 troops to Afghanistan, Donald Rumsfeld writes. But "we would have needed many months to build a large occupying army," and this would have given the Taliban time to prepare for the conflict, and al Qaeda both the incentive and the opportunity to relocate. 41-year-old, currently Controller of BBC Global News, replaces Andy Coulson , who resigned earlier this month amid the continuing row over phone-hacking when he was editor of the News of the World. Mr David Cameron said: I am very pleased that Craig Oliver is to become the new Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street. "Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist. He will do an excellent job in explaining and communicating the Government's programme.
